## Description {#details}

When writing a profile with size limit, user may want to use a different strategy to reduce function count other than dropping functions with fewest samples first.

In this case a class implementing the same interfaces should be provided to <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sampleprof/sampleprofilewriter/#a9283506633cf544e4a6163c0133fc769">SampleProfileWriter::writeWithSizeLimit()</a>.

Definition at line 42 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/profiledata/sampleprofwriter-h">SampleProfWriter.h</a>.

<SectionDefinition>

## Public Constructors

### FunctionPruningStrategy() {#a6be976c54f94894b624c258569f67bcb}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>llvm::sampleprof::FunctionPruningStrategy::FunctionPruningStrategy (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sampleprof/sampleprofilemap">SampleProfileMap</a> &amp; ProfileMap, size&#95;t OutputSizeLimit)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
<code>ProfileMap</code> A reference to the original profile map.

It will be modified by <a href="#a3bb7affe9c405afd71075e2e56513db4">Erase()</a>. <code>OutputSizeLimit</code> Size limit in bytes of the output profile. This is necessary to estimate how many functions to remove.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/profiledata/sampleprofwriter-h/#l00052">52</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/profiledata/sampleprofwriter-h">SampleProfWriter.h</a>.

<SectionDefinition>

## Public Member Functions

### Erase() {#a3bb7affe9c405afd71075e2e56513db4}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>virtual void llvm::sampleprof::FunctionPruningStrategy::Erase (size&#95;t CurrentOutputSize)</>}>
<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sampleprof/sampleprofilewriter/#a9283506633cf544e4a6163c0133fc769">SampleProfileWriter::writeWithSizeLimit()</a> calls this after every write iteration if the output size still exceeds the limit.

This function should erase some functions from the profile map so that the writer tries to write the profile again with fewer functions. At least 1 entry from the profile map must be erased.

<code>CurrentOutputSize</code> Number of bytes in the output if current profile map is written.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/profiledata/sampleprofwriter-h/#l00065">65</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/profiledata/sampleprofwriter-h">SampleProfWriter.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>
